title: Binary Tree
subject: Data Structures
theory:
A tree where each node has at most 2 children (Left, Right). 
Recursive definition: A node is a binary tree if left and right are binary trees.
syntax: class Node { int data; Node left, right; }

interview_questions.question: Max nodes in Binary Tree of height H?

exam_notes: Skewed tree acts like Linked List.
summary: The basis for BST and Heaps.
